com.nexmo.messaging.sdk
Class SmsSubmissionResult

java.lang.Object
  com.nexmo.messaging.sdk.SmsSubmissionResult

public class SmsSubmissionResult
extends java.lang.Object

SmsSubmissionResult.java

Created on 5 January 2011, 17:34

Represents the result of the submission of a single sms message, or a single part of a long / multi-part message

Version:
1.0
Author:
Paul Cook

Field Summary
static int STATUS_ACCOUNT_NOT_HTTP
          Message was rejected because your account is not provisioned for submitting via the REST interface.
static int STATUS_COMMS_FAILURE
          Message was not submitted because there was a communications failure.
static int STATUS_INTERNAL_ERROR
          Message was rejected due to a failure within the Nexmo systems.
Message can be re-submitted after a short delay
static int STATUS_INVALID_CREDENTIALS
          Message was rejected due to receiving invalid account username and/or password
static int STATUS_INVALID_MESSAGE
          Message was rejected because the Nexmo service was unable to handle this request.
static int STATUS_INVALID_PARAMS
          Message was rejected due to an illegal value in one or more elements of the submission request
static int STATUS_INVALID_SIGNATURE
          Message was not submitted due to a verification failure in the submitted signature
static int STATUS_MESSAGE_TOO_LONG
          Message was rejected because it exceeds the allowable maximum length (140 octets for a binary message, or 3200 chars for a text message)
static int STATUS_MISSING_PARAMS
          Message was rejected due to incomplete data in the submission request
static int STATUS_NUMBER_BARRED
          Message was rejected because the phone number you tried to submit to has been blacklisted.
static int STATUS_OK
          Message was successfully submitted to the Nexmo service
static int STATUS_PARTNER_ACCOUNT_BARRED
          Message was rejected because your account has been barred, or has not yet been activated
static int STATUS_PARTNER_QUOTA_EXCEEDED
          Message was rejected because your pre-paid balance does not contain enough credit to handle this request.
Please top up your balance before re-submitting this request or subsequent requests.
static int STATUS_THROTTLED
          Message was rejected due to exceeding the maximum throughput allowed for this account.
Message can be re-submitted after a short delay
static int STATUS_TOO_MANY_BINDS
          Message was rejected because already have the maximum number of concurrent connections allowed for your account.

Method Detail

getStatus

public int getStatus()
Returns:
int status code representing either the success of the message submission or a reason for failure

getMessageId

public java.lang.String getMessageId()
Returns:
String a unique identifier associated with the submitted message. This value will be returned in any subsequent delivery notifications in order that they may be correlated with the appropriate message submission request.

getErrorText

public java.lang.String getErrorText()
Returns:
String a human readable error message giving further description of the value of {see #getStatus()}

getClientReference

public java.lang.String getClientReference()
Returns:
String the client-reference that was supplied as part of the original message submission

getRemainingBalance

public java.math.BigDecimal getRemainingBalance()
Returns:
BigDecimal The account balance that remains after the submission of this message.

getMessagePrice

public java.math.BigDecimal getMessagePrice()
Returns:
BigDecimal The amount that was debited from your account balance upon submission of this message

getTemporaryError

public boolean getTemporaryError()
Returns:
boolean Indicates if the failure was due to a temporary condition. If so, then the message submission may be re-attempted after a short delay
